annotations.description: Let's hope the players will show us more in future games as today's one was rather average, without many exciting moments. The game was pretty even. The tactic of the home side was slow build up play and the away side was creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's the end of the match.
Dusan Tadic (Southampton) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) gets on the end of a pass and takes a low shot from the edge of the box which is straight at Fraser Forster, who makes a comfortable save.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Eljero Elia (Southampton) picks up a yellow card.
Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) receives a sweet pass inside the box, but his effort on goal is blocked by the defender. Corner kick. Liverpool will have an opportunity.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 4 min. of added time.

Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a promising strike towards the bottom left corner. Simon Mignolet guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.
Dusan Tadic (Southampton) takes the free kick from the edge of the box, but the goalkeeper perfectly sets up the defensive wall and his effort is thwarted.

Joe Allen (Liverpool) was trying to get to the ball but clattered into the legs of the opponent as well. Kevin Friend blows his whistle for an infringement. Southampton earn a free kick which could lead to a goal scoring opportunity.
Graziano Pelle (Southampton) is offside and the linesman raises his flag.
Fraser Forster pulls off a great save to deny Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) who, makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive towards the middle of the goal.
Dusan Tadic (Southampton) crosses the ball into the box from the free kick, but the defence clears the danger.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) was quite harsh and Kevin Friend didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card. Southampton are awarded the free kick.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Glen Johnson (Liverpool) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.
Simon Mignolet is alert and has a clear sight of a long through ball from Dusan Tadic (Southampton). Easy save!
Dusan Tadic (Southampton) stands over the free kick and opts to take it himself, but his low effort is straight at Simon Mignolet.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Alberto Moreno (Liverpool) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Kevin Friend had an easy decision to make. A free kick is awarded to Southampton.
Graziano Pelle (Southampton) reacts well to get to the rebound and takes a shot from the edge of the box, but he fails to get the ball through the players standing between him and the goal.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Ronald Koeman has decided to make a change. Dusan Tadic (Southampton) replaces Filip Djuricic.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: That's the end of the game for Jordon Ibe, who is replaced by Glen Johnson (Liverpool).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Raheem Sterling (Liverpool) is the lucky recipient of a rebound. He takes advantage of it and slots the ball low into the middle of the target, leaving the goalkeeper completely helpless.
Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
Kevin Friend blows for a foul after Victor Wanyama (Southampton) was too aggressive in the battle for the ball.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton) decides to speed play up by quickly sending the free kick into the box.
Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) commits an ugly tackle on his opponent, but there is no caution from the referee. Southampton have a free kick.
Great teamplay by Southampton as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.
Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) latches on to an accurate pass inside the box and shoots towards goal, but it goes well wide of the right post.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Kevin Friend shows a yellow card to Victor Wanyama (Southampton) for his blatant foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here's the change. Adam Lallana leaves the pitch and Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) comes on as a substitute.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety.

What a goal scoring opportunity! Sadio Mane (Southampton) makes a good run into the box to meet a cross and fires the ball in on goal, but the shot is amazingly blocked by a defender. The referee points to the corner flag and Southampton will take a corner.
Matt Targett (Southampton) makes a reckless foul in order to win the ball from his opponent. Kevin Friend has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. James Ward Prowse is going off and Ronald Koeman gives the last tactical orders to Sadio Mane (Southampton).
The linesman raises his flag for offside before Raheem Sterling (Liverpool) heads on.
James Ward Prowse (Southampton) whips a long ball in from the free kick which is intercepted by Simon Mignolet.
Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) robs an opponent of the ball and explodes in anger when Kevin Friend blows for a foul. Southampton have a free kick.
Raheem Sterling (Liverpool) finds himself beyond the last defender, but the game is stopped by the referee after the linesman signals for offside.
Graziano Pelle (Southampton) wastes a big opportunity! He controls the ball after a nice low pass and shoots from a promising distance. His poor effort goes miles wide of the left post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Ward Prowse (Southampton) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.
Southampton keep the ball well and push forward with purpose, but here comes an interception from the opposition. Southampton force a corner. They send men into the box.
Eljero Elia (Southampton) put a cross into the box which wasn't a bad decision, but he failed to achieve what he wanted as none of his teammates managed to meet it.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change after the half time break. Lazar Markovic is replaced by Alberto Moreno (Liverpool).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Ronald Koeman has decided to make a substitution during the half time break. Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton) comes on the pitch for Steven Davis.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to signal the start of the second half.

We can hope that the managers will be able to motivate the players and stir them to improve their performance for after the half time break. We haven't seen really exciting football in the previous 45 minutes. The home side dominated the first half in most aspects of the game, but the visitors will surely attempt to turn the situation around in the second half. The home side have dominated the possession and midfield so far. The visitors have spent most of their time defending and waiting for the right moment to launch counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has reached half time.

Filip Djuricic (Southampton) finds himself some space inside the box, collects a rebound and sends an effort in on goal. Simon Mignolet pulls off a fantastic reflex save to stop the ball going into the middle of the target.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Ward Prowse (Southampton) sends in a poor cross from the corner and Simon Mignolet has no trouble gathering it.
Eljero Elia (Southampton) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender. Southampton earn a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Ward Prowse (Southampton) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 1 additional min. will be played.
Victor Wanyama (Southampton) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The referee signals a corner kick to Southampton.
Great touch by Eljero Elia (Southampton) as he receives a precise pass deep inside the box and rips a shot goalwards, but the keeper pulls off an amazing save!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) has tested the patience of referee Kevin Friend and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
Maya Yoshida (Southampton) sends a long ball in, but Simon Mignolet comfortably gathers the ball.
Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) puts a cross into the box from the free kick, but the defender gets there first.
Kevin Friend blows his whistle for a foul after Eljero Elia (Southampton) hacks down one of his opponents. A free kick to Liverpool.
A crossfield pass from Lazar Markovic (Liverpool) fails to find any of his teammates.
Filip Djuricic (Southampton) gives away a foul for a fierce tackle on an opponent.
The resulting set piece, sent into the penalty area by James Ward Prowse (Southampton), was easily dealt with by one of the defenders.
Kevin Friend blows the whistle, Martin Skrtel (Liverpool) is penalised for a foul. Southampton have a free kick.
Eljero Elia (Southampton) crosses into the box from near the side line, but he doesn't connect as he wanted and it's cleared by the well organized defence.
Graziano Pelle (Southampton) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.
James Ward Prowse (Southampton) escapes without any punishment from the referee after using excessive force to foul his opponent.
James Ward Prowse (Southampton) whips in the resulting set piece but it's cleared.
Joe Allen (Liverpool) makes a strong challenge and Kevin Friend blows for a foul. Southampton are awarded a free kick.
Eljero Elia (Southampton) plays in a hopeful cross, but it doesn't find its way to any of the attacking players. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Liverpool.
Filip Djuricic (Southampton) makes a bad challenge and the referee blows his whistle for a foul.
Victor Wanyama (Southampton) brings his opponent down with a tackle and Kevin Friend blows his whistle for a foul.
Lazar Markovic (Liverpool) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) attempts to slip the ball through the defence, but is unable to find any of his teammates.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Simon Mignolet leaps to intercept the corner kick from James Ward Prowse (Southampton).

Southampton are playing some nice combination football, sending it precisely from player to player, but a defender shows good anticipation and ends the move with a good block. The referee blows his whistle, Southampton are awarded a corner kick.
Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) sends a long ball across the pitch, but it misses its target.
Kevin Friend couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) and blew his whistle.
Nathaniel Clyne (Southampton) attempts to send over a cross in order to find one of his teammates, but an opposition defender averts the danger by intercepting the effort.
James Ward Prowse (Southampton) sends in a lofted cross from a mid range free kick, but his poor effort goes out of play.
Lazar Markovic (Liverpool) manages to dispossess his opponent of the ball, but he commits a foul in the process and the referee blows his whistle. A free kick has been awarded to Southampton.
Jordon Ibe (Liverpool) sends over a cross from the side into the penalty area in order to find one of his teammates, but he fails and the opportunity goes begging.
James Ward Prowse (Southampton) receives a pass and unleashes a shot which goes well wide of the right post.
Victor Wanyama (Southampton) tackles a bit over zealously and Kevin Friend blows for a foul.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Ward Prowse (Southampton) takes a short corner kick.

Excellent touch by Eljero Elia (Southampton)! He latches on to a precise pass deep into the box and unleashes a low drive towards the left post, but the goalkeeper pulls off a terrific save. Southampton have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: What a phenomenal goal! Lazar Markovic sends a pass onto Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) who unleashes a spectacular long range shot and scores! The ball goes in off the inside of the left post, leaving the goalkeeper stranded. 0:1!
The Liverpool players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.
Liverpool will kick off.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!
The referee of today's match will be Kevin Friend.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: Both teams starting lineups are available now, so you can have a look at them.
Welcome to our live text commentary, ladies and gentleman! The starting lineups will be announced very soon, so just sit back and get ready to enjoy the action.

Let's hope the players will show us more in future games as today's one was rather average, without many exciting moments. The game was pretty even. The tactic of the home side was slow build up play and the away side was creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks.
